name: International Skoda Racin'n'Bashin
overview: International Skoda Racin'n'Bashin is a shoot 'em up game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Richard Bayliss using the Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit and published by Binary Zone PD in 1995. The game was an attempt to make a "Spy Hunter" like game using SEUCK.
